text: Look at the picture. Choose a food and describe it.
Look at the picture. Describe the room.
Describe your usual Fridays. What do you do? (Routine)
Put this phrase in order (語順): spell / you / that / how / do
How do you get to this classroom? Give directions.
Ask your classmate: Can you cook? + 2 follow-up questions
Describe your usual Fridays. What do you do? (Routine)
Introduce a Japanese holiday: What is it? When is it? (Ex. Coming of age day is on January 11th)
Think of a job. Describe it and your classmates guess.
